name: Elements Defender 3D: Epic Tower Defense
description:
** Level-up System and Talent System

Player can get growth points by level-up and formulate growing strategy to improve power of defense crystals、young defender and magicrystal.

** New added Nightmare Mode and Hell Mode
After player finishes the campaign mode, Nightmare Mode and Hell Mode will be unlocked to meet different player's needs. In these two modes, player's ability will be largely improved.


** New Staff and Elemental Essence
A more powerful and magnificent staff is added for defender to kill massive enemies. Player can collect Elemental Essence to recast stave, and increase abilities of stave's burning and critical strike etc.

**Hidden Boss Fight
Defeat hidden boss to get the precious loots.

**New Pets and Eggs hatching
More pets and a whole new pet eggs hatching system are added. Collect them to help you defend the Magicrystal.

**More powerful Traps and Guards

Bug fixed in V1.12:
*IAP problems
*Rating bugs
*Some crashes in iPhone4

Thanks GAMEZEBO & Appadvice for reviewing Elements Defender!!

***Featured as Today's Best Apps (18th Dec.) --- From Appadvice
***"Giving Elements Defender a style of gameplay that’s reminiscent of action RPGs like Torchlight 1 and 2" --- From gamezebo
***"Their teams self made gaming engine looks beautiful and the game plays JUST like they describe" --- From Toucharcade.com
***"Character animations are top class too. The real time shadow on the hero is pretty cool too" --- From Toucharcade.com

=================================================================

*** Stunning Gameplay and Graphics
-- Gorgeous graphics powered by our SELF-DEVELOPED 3D engine.
-- Terrific visual graphics and special shadow effects.

*** TD + RPG Mechanics
-- 5 Chapters to choose from: Sanctuary Hallway, NightStone Town, Academy Hall. Central Plaza and Lost Mine.
-- 16 Upgradeable Magic weapons with 3 kinds of magic: FIRE, ICE AND LIGHT.
-- Activate the towers all over the corners to help defeat the monsters and bosses
-- Pick up coins and Earn free crystals

*** In-Depth Strategy
-- Use 6 functional POTIONS to help defend the CRYSTAL
-- Set up TRAPS to kill massive monsters.
-- Collect and feed your PETS! They can fight with you!
-- Swap between weapons to defeat different monsters.
-- Unlock the CHALLENGE MODE to see how long you can survive. Earn more coins as you can in Challenge Mode.
-- Get FREE CRYSTALS every 10 mins to upgrade your items.

You are the last Magic Tower Defender! To protect the balance of the mainland, to defeat the invasion of the monsters, you need to defend the last magic crystal with your power!

Young Defender, Are You Ready?!

Creative TD meets Action-RPG. Pick up your weapons, upgrade the towers, fight with your pets, set up your traps and kill all those monsters!!! It is time to fight!

******* Will you survive? Young Defender *******

If you really like our game, pleas rate us! Your rating will bring more free updates!!
